creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, Seal, and Marks

ULC: [ 何法傳人吾不関君看画是自然間峰巒縮脚餘地淡墨穿林出遠山 ] (All the methods that restrict man don't apply to me; / What you see in this painting is my natural place. / Where peaks and ridges pull back, there is some leg room, / Pale ink penetrates the forest and distant mountains emerge.) (SA)
markings: LRQ: faded oval stamp; ULC, rectangular relief stamp; on mount, URC, in pencil, various Japanese; on back of mount, various
signed: ULC: [ 太乙老人併題 ] {Taiitsu Rōjin heidai}
title: My Natural Place
